trans-unit.source: How to test a driver package
trans-unit.target: How to test a driver package

trans-unit.source: You can use Visual Studio to deploy and install a driver package on a test computer, and then verify that the driver is installed and running.
trans-unit.target: You can use Visual Studio to deploy and install a driver package on a test computer, and then verify that the driver is installed and running.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: A driver package that is ready to install.
trans-unit.target: A driver package that is ready to install.

trans-unit.source: You must first create and build your driver and then create a driver package for installation.
trans-unit.target: You must first create and build your driver and then create a driver package for installation.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Building a Driver](building_a_driver.md) and [Creating a Driver Package](creating_a_driver_package.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Building a Driver](building_a_driver.md) and [Creating a Driver Package](creating_a_driver_package.md).

trans-unit.source: If you have not already done so, follow the instructions to [Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn745909).
trans-unit.target: If you have not already done so, follow the instructions to [Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Dn745909).

trans-unit.source: After you have configured and provisioned a test computer, you can use Visual Studio to deploy drivers, schedule tests, and debug drivers on the test computer.
trans-unit.target: After you have configured and provisioned a test computer, you can use Visual Studio to deploy drivers, schedule tests, and debug drivers on the test computer.

trans-unit.source: For information about deployment and about how you can deploy a driver automatically at build time, see [Deploying a Driver to a Test Computer](deploying_a_driver_to_a_test_computer.md).
trans-unit.target: For information about deployment and about how you can deploy a driver automatically at build time, see [Deploying a Driver to a Test Computer](deploying_a_driver_to_a_test_computer.md).

trans-unit.source: Instructions
trans-unit.target: Instructions

trans-unit.source: Step 1: To test the driver installation on a test computer
trans-unit.target: Step 1: To test the driver installation on a test computer

trans-unit.source: After you have configured and provisioned a test computer, you can configure the driver package project so that it is automatically deployed and installed on the test computer.
trans-unit.target: After you have configured and provisioned a test computer, you can configure the driver package project so that it is automatically deployed and installed on the test computer.

trans-unit.source: Open the property pages for your driver project.
trans-unit.target: Open the property pages for your driver project.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the driver project in Solution Explorer and select **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the driver project in Solution Explorer and select **Properties**.

trans-unit.source: In the property pages for the driver, click **Configuration Properties**, click **Driver Install**, and then click **Deployment**.
trans-unit.target: In the property pages for the driver, click **Configuration Properties**, click **Driver Install**, and then click **Deployment**.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Enable deployment** option.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Enable deployment** option.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Deployment Properties for Driver Projects](deployment_properties_for_driver_projects.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Deployment Properties for Driver Projects](deployment_properties_for_driver_projects.md).

trans-unit.source: Select the test computer you have configured as the **Remote Computer**.
trans-unit.target: Select the test computer you have configured as the **Remote Computer**.

trans-unit.source: Under **Driver Installation Options**, click **Install and Verify**, and then select the **Default Driver Installation Task**.
trans-unit.target: Under **Driver Installation Options**, click **Install and Verify**, and then select the **Default Driver Installation Task**.

trans-unit.source: Related topics
trans-unit.target: Related topics

trans-unit.target: Provision a computer for driver deployment and testing (WDK 8.1)
